spec_data.Name: trac-CGit-plugin
spec_data.Description:
Replace the trac browser by cgit.

Configure the url in the cgit ini panel and TracCGit
will replace the trac source browser (provided you
have a working cgit installation setup).

Plain and simple.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 10:55:20 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Replace the trac browser by CGit
